links.title: Big Oil Should Fear Tesla -- Dead or Alive
links.description: Oil prices may be on the floor, but we still use a lot of the stuff -- and Big Oil still rakes in billions from that. So why should it be scared of Tesla, which makes electric vehicles hardly anyone can afford and burns cash like you burn through a tank of gas?

links.description: Baird analyst Ben Kallo was out pounding the table on Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA), reiterating an Outperform rating and price target of $338, which represents a potential upside of 67% from where the stock is currently trading.
